sentence.text: These results indicate that regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II may work as an oncogene in colorectal cancer (CRC).

entity.text: regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: Here, we investigated regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II mRNA and protein expressions in colon cancer cells or surgically resected CRC.

entity.text: regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II
